lead_paragraph: Édgar Rentería hit a grand slam, Miguel Cabrera also homered and drove in five runs, and the resurgent Detroit Tigers roughed up the struggling Cy Young Award winner C. C. Sabathia in a 13-2 victory over the host Cleveland Indians on Wednesday night.
